oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Thompson Show (WACO) - 1948-04-24
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Hank Thompson radio show sponsored by Hamilton Furniture Company of Waco, Texas. Originally broadcast 1948-04-24, with announcer Bob Walker.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Thompson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Bob Walker) -- Theme (Brazos Valley Rancho) -- Bob Walker introduces Hank Thompson -- Anytime (Hank Thompson) -- Hamilton Furniture Company commercial (Bob Walker) -- Hank Thompson talks -- Mary Had A Little Lamb (His Love Was Pure As Snow) (Hank Thompson) -- Hamilton Furniture Company commercial (Bob Walker) -- Hank Thompson talks -- Sweeter Than The Flowers (Hank Thompson) -- Bob Walker and Hank Thompson talk -- Sixteen Tons (Hank Thompson) -- Hamilton Furniture Company commercial (Bob Walker) -- Hank Thompson and Bob Walker talk -- Waltz Of The Wind (Hank Thompson) -- Closing statement (Bob Walker) -- Theme (Brazos Valley Rancho)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Thompson, Hank; Walker, Bob, 1917-2007; WACO (Radio station : Waco, Tex.)
